description: Reality TV star Steven Daigle halts the judging of a new talent competition to console the defeated Broadway dancer, Zach Alexander. Steven gives Zach some wise and reasonable advice on showbiz, but Zach gets the wrong idea and initiates a hot and surprising casting couch session! Steven strips the determined twink and gets his celebrity cock sucked backstage. He goes down on Zach in return and bends him over for a salacious rimjob. Steven pounds Zach’s naïve ass doggy style, before sitting on the “casting couch” to give the lithe and eager Zach a ride on his stiff wood. Zach rides Steven like his career depends upon it (and it does)! They flip and ride each other like bulls until they cum like crazy.
title: Steven Daigle and Zach Alexander
